docs.lead_paragraph: A study in Finland has found that being overweight at midlife is associated with an increased risk of dementia. The researchers examined the records of 1,449 men and women randomly selected from participants in four other large health studies when they were 51 on average and then examined the participants 21 years later.

headline.main: Tie Between Obesity and Dementia Is Discovered

docs.snippet: A study in Finland has found that being overweight at midlife is associated with an increased risk of dementia.     The researchers examined the records of 1,449 men and women randomly selected from participants in four other large health studies...

docs.lead_paragraph: You don't have to look far -- at the hands (and feet) of women in all walks of life, at the displays in every pharmacy, at the nail salons that have proliferated around the country -- to realize that nails are in. There are more than 50,000 nail salons in the United States, and women (with the help of some men) spend more than $6 billion a year on nail care and cosmetics, from base coats and polish to wraps, silks, acrylics and tips.

headline.main: Sometimes, Your Nails Can Bite You Back

docs.snippet: Taking care of your nails is important, as the recent cosmetic rage may have untoward consequences.
